title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1152.23 - Vehicular ban
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1152.23 - Vehicular ban

State Regulations

The penalties above prescribed shall not preclude the
authority from excluding any terminal or terminal highway, permanently or for a
specified time, all vehicles violating any of the rules and regulations set
forth in this Part, as well as other vehicles owned or operated by the owner or
operator of such vehicle. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1152.23

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
